title: Famous Twins
description: Well-known twins in history, entertainment, and mythology

questions.question: In Roman mythology, which twin brothers were said to have founded the city of Rome?
Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen became famous as child actresses sharing which role on a TV sitcom?
In Greek mythology, Castor and Pollux are collectively known by what name?
Chang and Eng Bunker, born in Siam (now Thailand) in 1811, were famous for being what?
Which twin brothers are credited with co-founding the Winklevoss Capital Management firm and were depicted in 'The Social Network'?
In the Bible, which twins were the sons of Isaac and Rebekah?
The Kray twins, Ronnie and Reggie, were notorious gangsters in which city during the 1950s and 1960s?
In Shakespeare's play 'Twelfth Night,' the twins Viola and Sebastian are separated by what event?
Which famous advice columnists were twin sisters known as 'Dear Abby' and 'Ann Landers'?
In the movie 'The Parent Trap' (1961 and 1998), twin sisters discover each other at what type of location?
Apollo and Artemis are twin deities in Greek mythology. What was Artemis the goddess of?
The 'Minnesota Twin Study,' begun in 1979, studied twins raised apart to research what?
Twin musicians Tegan and Sara Quin are from which country?
In the zodiac, the constellation Gemini represents which concept?
Which famous twin brothers directed the film 'No Country for Old Men'?
